segments.text: Hi , Sean . It ’ s Mary in Mr . Emory ’ s office . I placed an order for 1,000 bound copies of a staff manual last week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It usually takes 2 to 3 weeks to complete a job like that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I was hoping you would do me a big favor . That was supposed to be a rush order , I forgot to tell you . I ’ m getting a lot of flak from my boss .
segments.speaker: S2
